column1: #NB.the canonical representation must use double quotes!

column2: select c/context/other_context from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1]
select c/context/other_context[at0001] from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1]
select c/context/other_context/name from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1]
select c/context/other_context[at0001]/name/value from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1]
select c/context/other_context[at0001]/items[at0002] from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1]
select c/context/other_context[at0001]/items[at0002]/archetype_node_id from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1]
select c/context/other_context[at0001]/items[at0002]/name/value from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1]
select c/context/other_context[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/value from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1]

select c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.case_identification.v0,'Fallidentifikation']/items[at0001]/value/value from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1]

select c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.case_identification.v0,'Fallidentifikation']/items[at0001,'Fall-Kennung']/value/value from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1]

column1: # test node/name predicate in where clause

column2: select c/name/value from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1] WHERE c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.case_identification.v0,'Fallidentifikation']/items[at0001,'Fall-Kennung']/value/value = '9251377'

select c/name/value from EHR e contains COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1] WHERE c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.case_identification.v0,'Fallidentifikation']/items[at0001,'no data']/value/value = '9251377'
